Title: Enacts the "non-motion under the influence of electronics act"
Summary: Enacts the non-motion under the influence of electronics act; prohibits using an electronic mobile device while temporarily stopped in a vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง1225-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the non-motion under the influence of electronics act
